Whether you're looking for tutoring, technical services, or creative collaborations, I’d love to hear from you! Feel free to reach out with any inquiries related to the following services:

**• Tutoring**: Private guitar lessons in metal, classical, jazz, blues, rock, and music theory. [See Ts&Cs here.](terms.qmd)

**• Mixing & Mastering**: Audio mixing and mastering services to help your music sound polished and cohesive.

**• Guitar Setups**: Expertise in setting up guitars, including floating bridges, fret leveling, and pickup wiring.

**• Rig Building**: Custom pedalboard setups, soldering, MIDI programming, and power management for quiet and efficient rigs.

**• Composing & Arranging**: Composition of prog metal instrumentals and arranging complex jazz charts.

**• Performing**: Solo and collaborative performances for a wide range of musical genres.

For any inquiries, contact me with the links below or email me at snowvalormae@gmail.com.
